Listen readable stream `end` or `error` event once.

## Install

```bash
$ npm i end-or-error
```

## Usage

```js
var eoe = require('end-or-error');

var stream = createReadStreamSomeHow();

eoe(stream, function (err) {
  // err => stream emitted "error" event
});
```
